Love the material love the way it fits very flattering Style. You can wear it a little off the shoulder or you could have it pulled forward to not be so off the shoulder. Material is very comfortable very breathable. He looks super cute and paired with the belt
Beautiful dress..  the green is the perfect color. It looks exactly like the photo
Very thin, almost costume like material.
I love this dress I will probably order again in different colors. Good quality nice fabric held up well through washing.

The Corset Dress I wore to the Renaissance fair was absolutely stunning. Its beautifully tailored bodice laced elegantly at the front, providing a flattering silhouette that accentuated my waist. Flowing down into a full, billowing skirt, the dress swayed charmingly with each step I took.
Amazingly well tailored! Love the fabric & sturdy stitching! Can’t believe how well & thoughtful placement on zippers & pockets. It’s like someone tailored this dress just for women in mind!!
Fits great
Comfortable the fabric is quality, make sure to wash it a few times to get the wrinkles out

Bought it for the Ren faire. All the Scarlett darkness dresses run big and there are no x-smalls so beware. The small still fit me fine and I wore a corset so it helped make it look how I wanted

评论概述: It has pockets and a zipper!
评论详情: The hidden side zipper made it easy to get into. The dress has a wide neck but the elastic pulls in at the waist. The forest green color was just right for a Rennaisance Festival. The dress length was right for my height of 5 feet.
This dress fits true to size and is very flattering.
I got an XL as I normally need extra space in the cup, but the dress actually ended up too big. So maybe order a size smaller

评论概述: Amazingly comfortable, great fit,I constantly get compliments.
评论详情: Awesome

I paired this dress with Alivila.Y Fashion Corset Womens Faux Leather Steampunk Corsets Victorian Bustier Top, Corset was XXL. Works amazingly with this dress!! I was going for a gothic victorian look for Halloween, I got so many compliments and I felt amazing. I believe the dress is XL, I am 5'7 about 195lbs with a large chest.

This white Renaissance-style off-shoulder dress is a major disappointment. The fabric is incredibly thin and feels cheap, which doesn't do the beautiful design any justice. It's unflattering on the body, failing to provide the structured elegance you might expect from a Renaissance-inspired piece. The fit is another issue—it's hard to imagine it looking good on many different body types.  Worse still, the dress is practically see-through, making it nearly unwearable without additional layers underneath. This level of transparency is certainly not what you'd expect from a dress like this. Overall, the dress doesn't live up to its style or potential, and I can't recommend it.
Soft fit and easy to put on it does run a bit small

I wore this dress to a friends dinner and got so many compliments on it! I have another corset dress I don’t really wear because the mid section is too tight! But with this dress I don’t have the same issue the mid section is not tight or hard but more so stretchy and still showed my curves. I would definitely purchase this again a different color

This dress is amazing! I was so worried about buying a shorter dress....I am on the thicker side and I usually wear a L or XL depending on the brand, and the XL fit me perfectly! The dress comes with a slip sewn inside and when you spin it doesn't flair too high. Don't worry about bending over to pick something up because this dress passes the test! I am pairing this with a pair of tall brown boots, and it could not be more perfect! If you are on the fence about this dress, just get it!!!

评论概述: Gorgeous and fits like a dream!
评论详情: If you’re on the fence about buying this dress, do it, especially if you are a bigger girl and/or have a large chest. It’s STUNNING on, fits incredibly well, sooooo flattering, the material is perfection and it’s comfortable. Plus, IT HAS POCKETS!! I am not a dress wearer normally (and I have some pretty hardcore sensory issues), but had a wedding to go to, so I needed something I would be comfortable in that also looked nice and this dress was PERFECT. I can’t say enough good things about it, and I ended up buying a second dress in a different color once I bought the first one and realized how amazing it was. 10/10, will probably be getting a third one!

I haven't gotten anything from this brand that I haven't liked, although I will say this garment in particular is definitely on the thin side. I don't mind that so much as it keeps things breathable, but as it is white there's a little sheerness happening that makes me wanna wear pasties. D:
It's a cute dress and the fabric is soft! True to size, quality is great with pockets. Lightweight!!

While the fabric is thin and came a bit wrinkled, but the style is so so fun and cute. Plus, the sleeves and length are sweet and not too skimpy. You'll look cute, perfect with added layers, and feel very fall. I got a medium and fit true to size.

I got the small, but it really fits more like a medium, so you may want to size down. That being said, it is really cute. The little corset designed waist is nicely done and it has a side zipper to make it easier to get on and off, if you need it.

This is a really pretty dress that compliments well overall. It's nice and flowers and a beautiful copper color. It's comfortable and made with good quality material.  I do suggest it for smaller top women but it's still cute, however, I think it didn't flatter much as I'm heavy on the top and with the dip between the chest area just magnify me in a way that isn't as flattering as with someone with a smaller chest but other than that the fit was great.

The quality of the fabric leaves something to be desired. It isn’t the most breathable, natural fabric but it is comfortable and it drapes very well and doesn’t wrinkle easily. The cut of the dress is very flattering. It fits true to size.

This Women's Corset Dress is absolutely stunning and incredibly flattering, especially if you're larger busted like I am. The Renaissance-inspired design with corset detailing beautifully cinches the waist, creating a graceful silhouette that's both timeless and elegant. The material is high-quality and feels great against the skin, and I love that the skirt is lined for added comfort and modesty. The off-shoulder versatility adds a bold, chic touch, allowing you to easily switch from modern to classic style depending on the occasion. The adjustable tie-front corset detail is fantastic for tailoring the fit, and the smocked back ensures a comfortable, snug fit that accommodates different body shapes.

This dress is so cute and versatile! It could be worn with a corset if you're going for a renaissance theme, or it could easily be styled on its own for a more modern look. The stretchy panel in the back makes for good sizing flexibility depending on whether you're going for a tighter or looser look. I could have easily sized down and the dress would still fit beautifully, albeit a bit more form-fitting. And it has pockets!! One of my favorite things to look for in a dress or skirt. Extremely pleased with this dress and this brand; highly recommend!

评论概述: Works best off sholder, very cute and flattering
评论详情: Really a lovely flirty cute dress, so comfortable to wear. I like the waist area details, looks great even without wearing a corset over it, pulls in nicely and is flattering. I have long arms, so if I pull the sleeves up to sholders, the length is a bit too short for me, but worn off the sholder it fits my long arms perfectly. I'm 155lbs and 5'5" for size reference with a 36dd chest. The bra straps will show on the back even with the arms pulled up (they don't show on the front when worn like this) so be aware if you want to wear it that way. I love the pockets and the way this fabric flows!

I picked this out for my daughter who falls into the women’s 18 range. I selected the largest size they had because I find the sizing is off most of the time and things are at least one size smaller than anticipated. In this case, the dress was too big. She absolutely adored the dress. She loved everything about it, the look, the aesthetic, and she couldn’t wait to wear it. She tried it on and it was just too big for her. She gave it to her twin who is a 22. It fits her fine. I am going back in and purchasing a smaller version of the dress for her. That is how much she loved it. I recommend it, but it does run large.

评论概述: Pretty but not the best material
评论详情: The material is very thin, definitely feels cheap but its not cheap. For $36 I expected better quality.

The material is soft and likely mostly polyester but not at all scratchy or irritating. The fabric is thin but comfortable, true to color. The fit in the middle has no elastic or give so be careful to watch the sizing guide in that region everywhere else will have more fabric to accommodate. Fits really well and is true to size.

I have a number of things from this brand and I really like all of them. This dress is no exception - it is absolutely adorable.  Because I've gained weight and am struggling to figure out if I'm a M or L, I went with the large and it fit well with a bit of room, which I much prefer to it being too small. Because this dress - oh my gosh, this dress is so darn cute!  At the time of this review, I see the seller is running a coupon sale, and you should absolutely snatch this dress up - on sale or not - because it's so figure flattering for multiple body types!  I really like that I can wear this on or off the shoulder, although due to my sizing up, this does want to be off the shoulder very badly. It's good for a quick throw it on and look cute, or dress it up to suit different aesthetics from a Renn Faire inspired look with a floral print corset belt, to a more goth look with a black waspie corset and leather strappy harnesses and belts.  The wrinkles steam out easily, and I already know this fabric washes well (shortest gentle cycle the machine has, cold water, hang to dry is how I do it) and will hold up to multiple wears. Most of my Scarlett Darkness pieces have been worn on repeat for years now, and still look brand new, and I anticipate this dress being no exception.

Do you like goth, kawaii, or somewhere in between? Are you a teen or young lady? I do believe you will love this dress. My grumpy teen smiled when she opened it up, and smiled when she came out of her room to show me what she looked like in it. Smiles are rare from her. That's the reason sh'es nicknamed grumpy teen. Or I could say moody, but I kinda like grumpy better. Anyway, let's get back to the dress, that's why you're here. I do think that the dress is a little overpriced, but grumpy teen does not. Since she'd be the one to price that kind of stuff, I'll go with her and say it's not. The corset isn't a real corset, there's nothing to tighten, same with the bow in the front. They're decoration only. The material is nice. The grumpy teen looks great in it with some platform shoes, so I think we hit it out of the ballpark with this dress. 5 stars.

评论概述: A Perfect Blend of Elegance and Edge!
评论详情: I recently wore the Women’s Corset Dress with Long Lantern Sleeves and Off-The-Shoulder design, and I couldn’t be more thrilled with the results! The dress combines classic elegance with a modern twist, featuring beautifully crafted lantern sleeves and a flattering corset that accentuates the waist perfectly.  Highlights:  Off-The-Shoulder Design: This style adds a touch of sultry sophistication, perfect for making a statement at any event. Long Lantern Sleeves: The sleeves are not only stylish but also add a unique flair to the overall look. Corset Fit: The corset is both comfortable and figure-enhancing, giving a seamless silhouette. Mini Dress Charm: The mini length is playful and chic, making it ideal for various occasions. The fabric feels luxurious against the skin, and the attention to detail is impeccable. I received countless compliments and felt confident and beautiful all evening. Highly recommend this dress for anyone looking to make an unforgettable impression!

This dress is adorable, and perfect for your next ren fair outing! The color is a little darker in person, but I think the subtle shift between looking blacker and looking more green depending on the light is very appealing. It definitely looks best with an added corset or belt to complete the look, but you could totally wear it on it's own for a more modern look. I ordered my normal size and it pretty much fits like a glove. The fabric is nice and light too, so it wouldn't be too hot in the sun all day, despite the long sleeves.

For reference im 5’7 a size 4 a small D cup and this fit exactly as I hoped. The color is beautiful, and its very well made. I absolutely love it. I have not ever gotten a bad item from this company and I couldn’t believe they even had items in the vine program.

My very picky daughter really loves this dress.  The color is so pretty!  It fit nicely and was plenty long enough.  I have very tall daughters and finding dresses that are long enough (without getting maxi dresses) is difficult.  This hit her just above the knees.  This will really look nice this fall with a pair of boots!

I love the color! It is a beautiful, consistent shade of emerald/evergreen with nearly matching lining.  The fit for me was slightly larger than expected. The smocking on the back has a moderate amount of give that would allow me to size down (from a medium to a small). I was able to put the garment on easily without using the zipper because the smocking made the dress almost stretchy towards the back. I am about 5'1", so if I purchased again I would get a small to have a tighter fit. Even without sizing down, the dress is so comfortable! The fabric flows beautifully and the lining + the hem hangs nice and neatly.  The bodice has a faux corset feel because you can't adjust or tighten the bodice in any way, the two strings at the neckline don't adjust, they are sewn in place, all you can do it tie them into a bow or untie them. The bodice is as is, so that's why if you want a snug fit, I suggest sizing down a size from your normal dress size.  The pockets on this dress were also uneven. One pocket (the left) is significantly deeper than the other (the right). The right pocket seemed to be caught in the seam of the lining, making it smaller than the left. I am used to tailoring my clothes because of my height, so I can fix and restitch that, and tighten the bodice at the size seams. But others mayn't be able to, and none of us should really have to, which is why I deducted one star- the irregular scale of the pockets, and the lack of corseting ability- the dress is really "AS IS" and you won't be able to adjust anything unless you or someone you know can sew.  I would buy this dress again though, knowing what to expect. It is very pretty, and even with the few hiccups, still nicely made. It will need steaming upon arrival, but overall it is a great dress- whether for date night, celebrations (graduations, recitals, family/friends milestone, etc.) or dressing up in the Medieval style. I definitely recommend!

I've been intrigued by this brand for awhile now and I'm so glad I finally got the opportunity to try one of their dresses out! I got this one in green and I'm in love with it.  I'm on the thicker side with a very exaggerated hourglass figure, so I definitely expected this to fit well in the bust and waist area. I was very apprehensive about the length, though. Being a bigger girl, I wasn't sure how this dress would look on me at this length; whether it would be short, or not. Thankfully it comes down to about the knee on me- and although I'm definitely out of my comfort zone there, it looks great. It fits amazingly in all other ways! When I tried it on and came out of my bedroom my family audibly gasped. That's got to be a good thing!  I feel great in it, too. Not just by way of confidence, but the fabric is so light and comfortable- it's not silk, but it's definitely smooth in a way that feels comparable to silk to me, and it breathes so well. So while it's a long sleeved dress, you might be able to wear it on the right day during the warmer months without so much as feeling uncomfortable with the temperature. The sleeves are built so that you can arrange them on your shoulders or off, depending on what you're most comfortable with.  I'm absolutely in love with this dress and really glad I got the chance to finally check this brand out. There's another dress of theirs I've had my eye on but have been too worried about how I'd like it to give myself permission to just grab it- now that I have an idea of the quality of clothing this brand puts out, I'm going to grab it ASAP!  Seriously, just buy it. You're going to love it. It's so beautiful and comfortable!

I sent this to my aunt because it's just her style and she LOVES it. She said it makes her body look amazing, goes great with her boots, and makes her feel like a fairy princess wandering the woods. She said she never wants to take it off. In the pictures she sent, she looked gorgeous in it! Great dress!

评论概述: I love this brand. SCARLET DARKNESS IS THE BEST!
评论详情: I love Scarlet Darkness clothes. You cant beat the price for the quality of these clothes. There arent many places that sell era clothing and the ones that do are so expensive and the quality is not even close to SD. These clothes are sewn to perfection. The sizes are spot on, they are the best at what they do. 5 stars and then some~!

I had super high hopes for this dress, and it came in and was utter perfection!  It fits beautifully. The waist is defined and the bodice moulds beautifully to the chest. The top can be worn on the shoulders or off for a versatile look.  The length is perfect and hits just above the knees.  It's very flattering and my daughter is obsessed.  Can be worn as regular style or cosplay.

This dress is gorgeous! I absolutely love the dark green color and it fits perfectly. And it's comfortable I can't wait to wear it out on a special occasion this Autumn. Both my black and cream heels looked great with the dress. It's just beautiful.

评论概述: Fits well and it is true to size
评论详情: This dress is made of 95% Polyester, 5% Elastane and it has a "crispness" to it and holds its shape well. The bow in the front is nice but it is not functional. It's merely for decoration so don't expect that it is going to tighten around your bust. Order the size that fits best for you. The length falls right above the knees. I like that you can move the top off your shoulders a bit. It's completely opaque. It's a very cute dress.
